result.translation: Guyyaa san (dachiin) oduu ishee ni odeessiti.
[Kunis] Waan Gooftaan kee isheetti beeksisa godheef.

result.arabic_text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
result.translation: Guyyaa san namoonni hojii isaanii agarsiifamuuf jecha garee gareen (bakka dhaabbii irraa) deebi’u.

result.arabic_text: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
result.translation: Namni (hanga) madaala atomii toltuu dalage isuma arga.

result.arabic_text: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
result.translation: Namni (hanga) madaala atomii hamtuu dalages isuma arga.
